pkgmetadata.longdescription: Anti-ORM is not an ORM, and it certainly does not want to be. Anti-ORM is asimple Python module that provides a pythonic syntax for making it moreconvenient to build SQL queries over the DBAPI-2.0 interface.In practice, if you're the kind of person that likes it to the bare metal, it'salmost as good as the ORMs. At least there is no magic, and it just works.
